title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Consolidated Copilot MCP policy statements into a reusable component and emphasized license restrictions.
Added GraphQL endpoint documentation for GitHub Enterprise Cloud with Data Residency.
Published patch release notes for GitHub Enterprise Server versions 3.14, 3.15, 3.16, and 3.17.
Updated CodeQL query tables: added Rust support, adjusted query inclusions, and removed deprecated JavaScript queries.
Updated GitHub IP ranges for GitHub Enterprise Importer with new addresses.
Fixed audit log references and REST API schema descriptions.
summary:

- Added GraphQL endpoint documentation for GitHub Enterprise Cloud with Data Residency.
- Published patch release notes for GitHub Enterprise Server versions 3.14, 3.15, 3.16, and 3.17.
- Updated CodeQL query tables: added Rust support, adjusted query inclusions, and removed deprecated JavaScript queries.
- Updated GitHub IP ranges for GitHub Enterprise Importer with new addresses.
- Fixed audit log references and REST API schema descriptions.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Consolidated Copilot MCP policy statements into a reusable component and emphasized license restrictions.
- Added GraphQL endpoint documentation for GitHub Enterprise Cloud with Data Residency.
- Published patch release notes for GitHub Enterprise Server versions 3.14, 3.15, 3.16, and 3.17.
- Updated CodeQL query tables: added Rust support, adjusted query inclusions, and removed deprecated JavaScript queries.
- Updated GitHub IP ranges for GitHub Enterprise Importer with new addresses.
- Fixed audit log references and REST API schema descriptions.
